lines.text: Arf! This dialog is missing!
Flight Control Leader to Chip! Red alert! We have alien raiders coming in!
The convoy is under attack! Come on, Mr. Woofberg, we have to save everyone!
Arf!
Not so fast, Chip. You will not be thwarting our plans this time! Get him, boys!
Oh no, they got me! I am a fantastic pilot, but I do not know self-defense.
Pilot the ship and save me, Mr. Woofberg!
Arf?
Quickly, Chip. We need you, they are all over us!
Arf!
Remember, Chip, Mr. Woofberg jettisoned the power-ups ...
to the prototype bounce gun this morning, so you will have to pick them up!
There is one right there.
Take care not to get hit by your own shots!
Arf?
Are you coming down with a cold? You sound a little off.
Oh no! Those fiends have adaptive shielding!
We can damage the shields, but until they are destroyed ...
our bouncy bolts get reflected!
Arf arf!
Those alien bastards have dropped laser barriers! ..
You will have to destroy the power unit to disable them.
Arf!
I swear, it sounds just like you are barking sometimes.
By god, look at that... It is as big as a small moon!
To be honest, Chip, I do not see how you could possibly defeat that thing.
It has been nice knowing you. I have a date with an escape pod. Goodbye!
GRRR.
Mr. Woofberg? Is that you? ..
You actually saved us? How?! You are a dog!
Arf!
That is amazing! No one is going to believe it, though.
So we will have to tell everyone I won us the battle.
GRRR.
Haha, good boy!
